variable.name: INVSITE
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the site (for internal use)

variable.name: INV
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the investigator (for internal use)

variable.name: VISIT_DATE
variable.comment: Truncated to YYYY

variable.name: INC1_01
variable.comment: Is the participant between 18 and 65 years of age at the time of entering the study?

variable.name: INC1_02
variable.comment: Is the participant Caucasian? (>/= 3 out of 4 grandparents must be caucasian as per CSA)?

variable.name: INC1_03
variable.comment: Has the participant given voluntary written consent to participate in the GeneMSA study?

variable.name: INC1_04
variable.comment: Is the participant diagnosed with MS or CIS according to the protocol (with no relapses within the 4 weeks prior to screening)?

variable.name: INC1_05
variable.comment: Does the participant have an EDSS (Expanded Disability Status Scale) score between 0 and 7.5?

variable.name: INC1_06
variable.comment: Is the participant able and willing to return to the center after 12 months for the second investigation?

variable.name: INC1_07
variable.comment: If a sibling, does the participant meet the case inclusion criteria?

variable.name: INC2_01
variable.comment: Is the participant between 18 and 65 years of age at the time of entering the study?

variable.name: INC2_02
variable.comment: Is the participant Caucasian? (>/= 3 out of 4 grandparents must be caucasian as per CSA)?

variable.name: INC2_03
variable.comment: Has the participant given voluntary written consent to participate in the GeneMSA study?

variable.name: INC2_04
variable.comment: Is the participant devoid of any history or family history of MS?

variable.name: EXC1_01
variable.comment: Has the participant received any corticosteroids within 4 weeks of screening for treatment of MS? If non-systemic steroids are being used for other chronic inflammatory conditions, subjects may be included at the discretion of the investigator.

variable.name: EXC1_02
variable.comment: Does the participant have a history or suspicion of current drug abuse or alcohol abuse within the last 6 months?

variable.name: EXC1_03
variable.comment: Has the participant had any concurrent illness, disability or clinically significant abnormality that may prevent him/her from safely completing the assessments required by protocol?

variable.name: EXC1_04
variable.comment: Does the participant have a condition which in the opinion of the investigator would render the patient unsuitable for a MRI?

variable.name: EXC1_05
variable.comment: Is the patient participating in ongoing MS Clinical Trials with non-approved drugs?

variable.name: EXC2_01
variable.comment: Does the participant have a past history or current diagnosis of MS?

variable.name: EXC2_02
variable.comment: Is the participant related to a case or another control?
